attributes.action: Time to build upwards in all cities.
attributes.additional_details: Time to build upwards in all cities, save our country from spread & give people good quality space & security in Skyscraper apartments. I am sure we can supply good quality apartments of any size in a Skyscraper building with full security in this modern age for all people in this overpopulated country of ours. This has the advantages of community & emeneties close at hand in a city.
